content.question: The first six nonzero terms of the Maclaurin series for <math alttext="f" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> are <math alttext="1 plus x, minus the fraction with numerator x squared, and denominator 2 factorial, end fraction, minus the fraction with numerator x cubed, and denominator 3 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction with numerator x to the fourth power, and denominator 4 factorial, end fraction, plus the fraction with numerator x to the fifth power, and denominator 5 factorial, end fraction " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>1</mn><mo>+</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>!</mo></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="f of x " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>f</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="e to the negative x power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="cosine x, plus sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="cosine x, minus sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>
<math alttext="sine x, minus cosine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="cosine x, plus sine x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>cos</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi>sin</mi><mo>⁡</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 10.14: (BC ONLY) Finding Taylor or Maclaurin Series for a Function

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
